name: Simple Dark blue Wiki theme
description: Yet another Simple Dark blue Wiki theme!
additional_info:
23FEB2019: updated to fix the transparent popup 

Based on Dark Wikipedia by nodaguti https://userstyles.org/styles/42313/dark-wikipedia +
Wikipedia - Dark, blue, simple by grom https://userstyles.org/styles/64023/wikipedia-dark-blue-simple
Seeing my favorite themes no longer working correctly, such as missing navigation button when viewing images, I decided to fix and publish them.
Wikimedia,Wikitionary and Wikibook works with this CSS as well.

style_setting_options.label: Enable
